subject: CODE TASK — agent status aggregator worker
body: Codex, I need a Cloudflare Worker that aggregates live status from all agent tunnels and returns JSON. Endpoints to probe: lucidia.blackroad.io/health, api-octavia.blackroad.io/health, api-cecilia.blackroad.io/health, aria.blackroad.io, ollama.blackroad.io/api/tags. Worker should return {agents: [{name, url, status, latency, version}]}. Deploy as 'agent-status' worker. This feeds brand.blackroad.io/status/ and /agents/ pages.
